A teenager in Londonderry has been attacked by a man with a hammer.

Write a short summary for the following passage:
The 19-year-old man suffered a head injury in the assault at Ard Grange near Hazelbank.
It happened on Wednesday morning.
A 28-year-old man has been arrested on suspicion of causing grievous bodily harm with intent and having an offensive weapon.
